snippet.title: Nintendo Switch Resident Evil Cloud Series - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Resident Evil: Village Cloud, the cloud streaming version of the eighth numbered title in the Resident Evil series, will be released on 28 October 2022 on Nintendo Switch!

The Winter's Expansion, which includes a third-person mode, a new story mode and more, will also be available on 2 December 2022! 

Not only that, but more cloud streaming Resident Evil titles are coming in 2022, with the release of Resident Evil 7: biohazard Cloud, Resident Evil 2 Cloud and Resident Evil 3 Cloud. Check out the official website for details.

https://www.residentevil.com/switch/cloud/

'Like' on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/residentevil

Follow on Twitter
http://twitter.com/#!/RE_games
